scope_summary: Describe the exact user-facing change and why it is beneficial.

privacy_local_first_promise.rationale: Confirm explicit consent and no silent exfiltration.

medical_scope_and_claims.rationale: Confirm no diagnosis/treatment claims and proper disclaimers.

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Confirm the feature reduces friction without coercion.

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Confirm assumptions are consistent with available ND research.

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Confirm expected benefit outweighs foreseeable harm.

brand_voice_and_claims.rationale: Confirm messaging is on-brand and non-manipulative.

accessibility_and_inclusion.rationale: Confirm readability, keyboard use, and low-cognitive-load behavior.

security_and_reliability.rationale: Confirm no new security regression and runtime still works.

monetization_and_dark_pattern_check.rationale: Confirm monetization is transparent and opt-in with no coercive UX.

ship_decision.conditions: Set to true only when every blocker is resolved.
